name: Game Jam (AbbasKhanGames)
description:
Twin Stick Shooter minus a stick and shooting!

Evade the hordes of bread who are attempting to steal your GLORIOUS jam!

Use your reactions and skills to guide Mr. JamJar away from the evil breads.

Charge up your Jam-Splosion and use it to defeat as many breads as you can!

Bread Types:

Generic Bread: Charges directly for the jam

Blue Ball Bread: Is surprisingly oblivious

Red  Ball Bread: Thinks he's a rugby player, charging at you with full force.

Game comes with support for Mouse & Keyboard, Dualshock 4 Controller & Xbox 360 Controller.

This game was created for the GMTK 2018 Game Jam around the theme 'Genre without mechanic'.
